source_image.description: A breakdown of the image source types in the dataset. Each label indicates whether it applies to the dataset, with supporting evidence from the paper.

Human-Generated.description: The image is entirely produced by humans, e.g. photographs and hand-drawn images.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where the human-generated nature of the image is stated or supported (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the image is classified as human-generated.

Model-Generated.description: The image is synthetically produced by AI models, e.g. model-generated images.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this label applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper where the model-generated nature of the image is stated or supported (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the image is classified as model-generated.

Unknown Origin.description: The source of the image is not specified, not reported, or derived from web-crawl data with unclear provenance.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if the dataset includes image with unknown provenance. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper indicating the information of the image dataset (e.g., 'Appendix A').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the origin is considered unknown.

N/A.description: The dataset does not contain any image data.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if the dataset contains no image. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: The location in the paper confirming that the dataset does not include image (e.g., 'Section 1.1').

reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the dataset is not applicable for image-based analysis.
